mapper.select: SELECT t1.title, t1.icon, t1.path, t2.role_id, t2.menu_id FROM role_menu t2 LEFT JOIN sys_menu t1 ON t2.menu_id = t1.id WHERE t2.role_id = #{roleId} AND t1.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY t1.sort

SELECT t1.title, t1.icon, t1.path, t2.permissions FROM role_menu t2 LEFT JOIN sys_menu t1 on t2.menu_id = t1.id WHERE t2.role_id = #{roleId} AND t1.parent_id = #{parentId} AND t1.id = t2.menu_id ORDER BY t1.sort
